messages.title: Let’s get Britain on the road to recovery
messages.content: Our economy is in a fragile state. One wrong move could send Britain tumbling back into recession. Now more than ever our country needs the right policies to get the economy moving again.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Vince Cable proposes to get the banks lending to small businesses and ensure that people’s savings are never put at risk again. A fairer tax plan will put more money back in the pockets of ordinary families.

issues.economy: One wrong move could send Britain tumbling back into recession.

politicalExperience.role: Shadow Chancellor of the Exchequer for the Liberal Democrats

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS - Labour can’t win in many areas of Britain. For real change, fairer taxes and a strong economy, make sure you back the Liberal Democrats on election day.
